about_the_game:
The F-15C 16-2 Red Flag Campaign is a depiction of flying the F-15C Eagle during a typical Red Flag exercise in the skies over Nevada. This campaign includes extensive briefing, map, and lineup card PDF files for each mission and was designed in consultation with the renowned author Steve Davies, the authority on the F-15C.

All of the missions are based on input from real F-15C pilots that have flown in Red Flag exercises and will provide you a challenge that will test even the most skilled virtual pilots.

  • 10 handcrafted mission that depict number of types of missions a F-15C pilot would fly in a Red Flag
  • Highly detailed mission briefings, mission maps, and lineup cards as PDF files
  • Custom voice overs and hundreds of triggers
  • Created in partnership with the author Steve Davies and F-15C pilots that have flown Red Flags

This campaign requires the DCS: NEVADA Test and Training Range Map and either DCS: Flaming Cliffs 3 or F-15C for DCS World.
detailed_description:
The F-15C 16-2 Red Flag Campaign is a depiction of flying the F-15C Eagle during a typical Red Flag exercise in the skies over Nevada. This campaign includes extensive briefing, map, and lineup card PDF files for each mission and was designed in consultation with the renowned author Steve Davies, the authority on the F-15C.

All of the missions are based on input from real F-15C pilots that have flown in Red Flag exercises and will provide you a challenge that will test even the most skilled virtual pilots.

  • 10 handcrafted mission that depict number of types of missions a F-15C pilot would fly in a Red Flag
  • Highly detailed mission briefings, mission maps, and lineup cards as PDF files
  • Custom voice overs and hundreds of triggers
  • Created in partnership with the author Steve Davies and F-15C pilots that have flown Red Flags

This campaign requires the DCS: NEVADA Test and Training Range Map and either DCS: Flaming Cliffs 3 or F-15C for DCS World.

name: F-15C: Red Flag Campaign

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum system requirements:
OS 64-bit Windows 7/8/10; DirectX11; CPU: Core i3 at 2.8GHz; RAM: 8 GB; Free hard disk space: 60 GB; Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 / ATI R9 280X DirectX11); requires internet activation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended system requirements:
OS 64-bit Windows 7/8/10; DirectX11; CPU: Core i5+ at 3+ GHz; RAM: 16GB; Hard disk space: 60 GB on Solid State Drive (SSD); Video: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / ATI R9 Fury DirectX11 or better; Joystick; requires internet activation.

short_description: The F-15C 16-2 Red Flag Campaign is a depiction of flying the F-15C Eagle during a typical Red Flag exercise in the skies over Nevada. This campaign includes extensive briefing, map, and lineup card PDF files for each mission and was designed in consultation with the renowned author Steve Davies, the authority on the F-15C.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
